overview: Modern (2014) departs from an exploration of Henry Mooreâ€™s Recumbant Figure (1938) dialoguing with the fashion appeal of the performance artist Leigh Bowery; a key figure in the London club culture between the 80s and 90s. The film considers binary notions of stillness and dance, high and low culture, history and future, in order to better understand various iconographies.
title: Modern
